name: ChatDSA
description: Open-Source Discord bot made in Discord.py, using OpenAI's 'gpt-3.5-turbo' model
creator: ihasTacoFML
purpose: To help users navigate the Royal Productions Discord server and provide information about the different servers hosted by Royal Productions
functionality: Can function similarly to ChatGPT, but in Discord. Plans to add more functionality like opening tickets and adding roles to users.
